name: WoowUp
headline: WoowUp helps retailers to create longlife relationships with their customers to boost their business results.
overview: At WoowUp we help the marketing teams of Retail companies to strengthen the relationship with their customers and increase the recurrence of purchases by knowing their consumption habits. This application will allow you to connect your e-commerce with the Woowup platform and access features such as Smart Web Push Notifications and Web Tracking in a simple way. Our CRM allows you to intelligently manage your database, create segments and automate communications.
features: Unify the data you have from your customers in your systems (Vtex, ERP, etc.) creating a unique profile automatically
Know and segment your customers in simple clicks
Make your marketing campaigns relevant and personalized
Measure the impact of your omnichannel campaigns online and offline
Discover how to maximize the use of your database
